segments.text: Robin , what are you going to do tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Bob and I plan to play hockey in the morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , in the afternoon , after a long nap , we â€™ ll go yachting with Nora .

segments.text: It seems that you will have a nice day tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about you ? What are you going to do tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have a lot of work in the office and a lot of chores in the house.How I envy you , Robin !
